member.name: IClassFactory.LockServer
member.summary: Locks an object application open in memory. This enables instances to be created more quickly.
member.param: If TRUE, increments the lock count; if FALSE, decrements the lock count.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IClassFactory
member.summary: Enables a class of objects to be created.
